entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
